au.edu.federation.caliko.visualisation

Class FabrikConstraint3D

  • java.lang.Object
    • au.edu.federation.caliko.visualisation.FabrikConstraint3D

  • public class FabrikConstraint3D
extends Object
    A class to draw various constraints for ball and hinge joints on FabrikBone3D objects.
    Version:
    0.3 - 09/12/2015
    Author:
    Al Lansley

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      FabrikConstraint3D()
      Default constructor.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void draw(FabrikChain3D chain, float lineWidth, Mat4f mvpMatrix)
      Draw the constraints on all bones in a FabrikChain3D object.
      void draw(FabrikChain3D chain, Mat4f mvpMatrix)
      Draw the constraints on all bones in a FabrikChain3D object using the default line width.
      void draw(FabrikStructure3D structure, float lineWidth, Mat4f mvpMatrix)
      Draw the constraints on all chains and all bones in each chain of a FabrikStructure3D object.
      void draw(FabrikStructure3D structure, Mat4f mvpMatrix)
      Draw the constraints on all chains and all bones in each chain of a FabrikStructure3D object using the default line width.

    • Constructor Detail

      • FabrikConstraint3D

        public FabrikConstraint3D()
        Default constructor.

    • Method Detail

      • draw

        public void draw(FabrikChain3D chain,
                 float lineWidth,
                 Mat4f mvpMatrix)
        Draw the constraints on all bones in a FabrikChain3D object. Line widths may commonly be between 1.0f and 32.0f, values outside of this range may result in unspecified behaviour.
        Parameters:
        chain - The chain to use.
        lineWidth - The width of the lines to draw.
        mvpMatrix - The ModelViewProjection matrix to use.

      • draw

        public void draw(FabrikChain3D chain,
                 Mat4f mvpMatrix)
        Draw the constraints on all bones in a FabrikChain3D object using the default line width. If the chain does not contain any bones then an IllegalArgumentException is thrown.
        Parameters:
        chain - The chain to use.
        mvpMatrix - The ModelViewProjection matrix to use.

      • draw

        public void draw(FabrikStructure3D structure,
                 float lineWidth,
                 Mat4f mvpMatrix)
        Draw the constraints on all chains and all bones in each chain of a FabrikStructure3D object. If any chain in the structure does not contain any bones then an IllegalArgumentException is thrown. Line widths may commonly be between 1.0f and 32.0f, values outside of this range may result in unspecified behaviour.
        Parameters:
        structure - The structure to use.
        lineWidth - The width of the lines to draw.
        mvpMatrix - The ModelViewProjection matrix to use.

      • draw

        public void draw(FabrikStructure3D structure,
                 Mat4f mvpMatrix)
        Draw the constraints on all chains and all bones in each chain of a FabrikStructure3D object using the default line width. If any chain in the structure does not contain any bones then an IllegalArgumentException is thrown.
        Parameters:
        structure - The structure to use.
        mvpMatrix - The ModelViewProjection matrix to use.
